issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
While testing Window Acceptance I notised changes in a background window after rotating the device from a portrait mode to a lanscape and back. It changing from a white screen to an Appcelerator's logo.

Not a regression, the behavior exists on 2.0.1 as well.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Run Application Titanium.UI.Window Acceptance TIMOB-7931. 

Expected result:
You should see a white screen with the text 'Hello World"

Actual Result:
see Attachments
fields.summary: Android: TI.UI.Window  - v8: a background window changed after the device's rotation from portrait to landscape mode and back
fields.environment:
Titanium Studio, build: 2.0.3.201205250852
Titanium SDK: 2.0.2.v20120525161324

Device:
Nexus One 2.2.2

comments.body: Closing this ticket since the min supported Android SDK is Android 2.3.3 (API 10)
